name: Fallen Down Eng (demo)
description:
Fan francophone de Yandere Simulator ?

La demo est aussi disponible en français !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By the way, I'm sorry if there are some mistakes or weird sentences. English is not my mother language but I try my best !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Great job. One more time, you've managed to get rid of a rival in love with your dear senpai.

You must be happy, Yandere-chan.

But… I'm afraid your senpai is a kind of a Don Juan…

Because another is falling into his charms and senpai is into hers.

Which is quite surprising coming from her, by the way...

And Something tells me you won't be able to eliminate her as easily as the previous ones...

Oh ! Before I forgot : Killing also boys is a very good strategy. I totally approve.

What ? Her name ?

Well… How to say this…

Say, Ayano, I know socializing isn't your hobby but have you ever heard of a girl named…

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wanna talk about Fallen Down ?

Sure ! I don't mind as long as you respect those two conditions :

_ If it's a big thing like an amino post, a video  or Something like that ; please put a link to this page or to my Twitter account in the description.

_ In all cases, I would like you to send me by email (eeveegfi@gmail.com) what you've done. Don't worry ! It's not to bash you or to tell you "it's shitty, delete that immediately" ; it's only to be sure that I see everything going around my work. :-)
